titles.title: A resolution electing Gary B. Myrick, of Virginia, as Secretary for the Minority of the Senate.
A resolution electing Gary B. Myrick, of Virginia, as Secretary for the Minority of the Senate.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution elects Gary B. Myrick of Virginia to be Secretary for the Minority of the Senate.
